sys_hub_flow.name: Malware_Playbook_Enterprise_v3

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Prepare : Collect Observables for Triage
Lookup Threat Reputation and Enrichment lookup workflows
Pause to confirm if automated triage runs have been successful

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=Have the automated triage runs been successful ?^outcome_type=yes_no^parent={{Created or Updated_1.current}}

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Get Palo Alto WildFire Enrichment for the Hash

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Create an IT Service ticket for rebuilding the device

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=Request to Rebuild the Device Affected by {{Created or Updated_1.current.number}}^description=Please Rebuild the infected device : {{Created or Updated_1.current.cmdb_ci.name}} and it's assets {{Created or Updated_1.current.cmdb_ci.asset.display_name}}

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Wait for Reputation and Enrichment Results to come back
Enrich Any file hashes with Palo Alto Wildfire for Further Investigation

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Post a worknote informing the analyst that the approval request has been made

sys_variable_value.value: work_notes=An Approval request has been made for proceeding with Containment

subflow.display_value: Run Threat Lookups for Observables V1

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Signal the start of Incident Response
Signal Completion of the Reputation lookup and Enrichment Activities

sys_variable_value.value: state=3^short_description=Completed Automated Actions : Get Reputation for All observables and Perform Enrichment with configured Integrations...

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance.comment: Create Block Requests for Malicious Observables

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Create a task to capture the details of the approval sought

sys_element_mapping.value: parent={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^short_description=Seeking Approval to Contain the Malware Attack for Incident ID : {{Created or Updated_1.current.number}}^description=Requesting approval for containment of the incident. Here is the Investigation summary : No. of Malicious Observables - {{9ed2d211-20fd-43ff-98bc-0036d4aa51d8.observablescount}}. Affected CI - {{Created or Updated_1.current.cmdb_ci.name}} . Incident Severity - {{3446a89f-a94b-4b44-a88b-ee05c5b3ad04.record.severity}}. Sightings have been seen in the Log store

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Move the Security Incident to Review

sys_variable_value.value: state=100^work_notes=Incident is now in the Review Stage. Update posted to the SOC Slack channel.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Prepare : Is everything necessary to begin investigation available ?

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=Have all necessary observables been captured ?^outcome_type=yes_no^parent={{Created or Updated_1.current}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Is the Suspected Malware a Ransomware ?
Review investigation results. Are they satisfactory ?

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=Review investigation results. Are they satisfactory ?^outcome_type=yes_no^parent={{Created or Updated_1.current}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Prepare to perform a Sighting Search (is this a widespread problem ?)

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance.comment: Prepare : Automatically Accord the right severity to the Incident

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Proceed with Containment ?

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=Proceed with Containment Automation ?^outcome_type=yes_no^parent={{Created or Updated_1.current}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update the task that was tracking the approval

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=Approved : Contain the Malware Attack for Incident ID : {{Created or Updated_1.current.number}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Is the environment secure ?

sys_element_mapping.value: parent={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^short_description=Confirm if the Environment is Secure^description=Confirm if the environment is now secure by running a Sighting Search, repeat containment till no sightings found. ^outcome_type=yes_no

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Perform Containment or Initiate Remediation measures !

sys_variable_value.value: Starting Automated Actions : Get Reputation for All observables and Perform Enrichment with configured Integrations...

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Prepare : Move Incident State to Analysis
Get Malicious Observables associated with the incident
Move Incident to the Contain State and Post a Worknote
Identify all SHA256 Hashes Ids from the incident
Post a worknote that the approval is awaited
Send Analysis Summary over Email

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi, 

The initial analysis for Trigger➛Security Incident Record➛Number is now complete. Here are the findings so far : 

Number of Malicious Observables associated : 9➛observablesCount

Was this determined as a Ransomware attack ? 12➛Security Incident Flow Response Task➛Outcome 

Permission is being sought to proceed with containment procedures.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Containment Approval from SOC Leadership !
